fields.name: pubkey
fields.description: Pubkey of account to query, as a base-58 encoded string.

fields.name: commitment
fields.description: Commitment level for the query. finalized | confirmed | processed

fields.name: encoding
fields.description: Encoding format for account data. base58 | base64 | base64+zstd | jsonParsed

fields.name: dataSlice
fields.description: Request a slice of the account's data.

fields.name: dataSlice.offset
fields.description: Byte offset from which to start reading.

fields.name: dataSlice.length
fields.description: Number of bytes to return.

fields.name: minContextSlot
fields.description: The minimum slot that the request can be evaluated at.

fields.name: changedSinceSlot
fields.description: Only return the account if it has been modified at or after this slot number. If unchanged since that slot, response can include status: unchanged.

fields.description: The unique identifier (typically mint address) of the Solana NFT or digital asset to retrieve.

fields.name: options
fields.description: Display and formatting options for the asset data response.

fields.name: options.showUnverifiedCollections
fields.description: Display grouping information for unverified collections instead of skipping them. Default: false.

fields.name: options.showCollectionMetadata
fields.description: Display metadata for the collection. Default: false.

fields.name: options.showFungible
fields.description: Display fungible tokens held by the owner. Default: false.

fields.name: options.showInscription
fields.description: Display inscription details of assets inscribed on-chain. Default: false.

fields.name: page
fields.description: Page number for paginating through large asset collections (1-based indexing).

fields.name: limit
fields.description: Maximum number of assets to return per page (up to 1000).

fields.name: before
fields.description: Pagination cursor for retrieving assets before this position.

fields.name: after
fields.description: Pagination cursor for retrieving assets after this position.

fields.description: Sorting configuration for ordering the returned Solana assets.

fields.name: sortBy.sortBy
fields.description: Sort criteria: created | recent_action | updated | none.

fields.name: sortBy.sortDirection
fields.description: Sort direction: asc | desc.

fields.name: options
fields.description: Display and filtering options for returned Solana asset data.

fields.name: options.showUnverifiedCollections
fields.description: Include grouping information for unverified collections. Default: false.

fields.name: options.showCollectionMetadata
fields.description: Include detailed metadata for collections. Default: false.

fields.name: options.showGrandTotal
fields.description: Include grand total count (may increase response time). Default: false.

fields.name: options.showFungible
fields.description: Include SPL tokens and fungible assets. Default: false.

fields.name: options.showNativeBalance
fields.description: Include native SOL balance. Default: false.

fields.name: options.showInscription
fields.description: Include inscription details for assets with inscriptions. Default: false.

fields.name: options.showZeroBalance
fields.description: Include assets with zero balance. Default: false.

fields.description: Authority address criteria for filtering assets.

fields.name: limit
fields.description: Maximum number of assets to return.

fields.name: sortBy
fields.description: Sorting options for the response.

fields.name: sortBy.sortBy
fields.description: Sort criteria: created | recent_action | updated | none.

fields.name: sortBy.sortDirection
fields.description: Sort direction: asc | desc.

fields.name: compressed
fields.description: Filter for compressed NFTs.

fields.name: compressible
fields.description: Filter for compressible assets.

fields.name: delegate
fields.description: Delegate criteria for the asset search.

fields.name: creatorAddress
fields.description: Creator address criteria.

fields.name: creatorVerified
fields.description: Whether creator is verified.

fields.name: grouping
fields.description: Grouping filter array, e.g. ["collection","<collectionKey>"].

fields.name: tree
fields.description: Merkle tree address for compressed NFT filtering.

fields.name: supply
fields.description: Supply criteria.

fields.name: supplyMint
fields.description: Supply mint criteria.

fields.name: frozen
fields.description: Whether asset is frozen.

fields.name: burnt
fields.description: Whether asset is burnt.

fields.name: interface
fields.description: Interface type filter (V1_NFT, ProgrammableNFT, FungibleToken, etc.).

fields.name: royaltyTargetType
fields.description: Royalty target type criteria.

fields.name: royaltyTarget
fields.description: Royalty target criteria.

fields.name: royaltyAmount
fields.description: Royalty amount criteria.

fields.name: ownerType
fields.description: Ownership model criteria.

fields.name: before
fields.description: Cursor for paginating backward.

fields.name: after
fields.description: Cursor for paginating forward.

fields.name: options
fields.description: Advanced display options for search response.

fields.name: options.showUnverifiedCollections
fields.description: Show unverified collections. Default: false.

fields.name: options.showCollectionMetadata
fields.description: Show collection metadata. Default: false.

fields.name: options.showGrandTotal
fields.description: Show total number of matches (slower). Default: false.

fields.name: options.showNativeBalance
fields.description: Show owner native SOL balance. Default: false.

fields.name: options.showInscription
fields.description: Display inscription details. Default: false.

fields.name: options.showZeroBalance
fields.description: Display assets with zero balance. Default: false.

errors.message: Authentication failed. Missing or invalid API key.
errors.description: Unauthorized - missing or invalid API key.

error.message: Authentication failed. Missing or invalid API key.

errors.message: You do not have permission to access this resource.
errors.description: Forbidden.

error.message: You do not have permission to access this resource.

errors.message: No assets found matching the search criteria.
errors.description: Not Found.

error.message: No assets found matching the search criteria.

errors.message: Rate limit exceeded. Please try again later.

error.message: Rate limit exceeded. Please try again later.

error.message: An unexpected error occurred on the server.

fields.name: transaction
fields.description: The fully-signed Solana transaction encoded as a base-58 string for blockchain submission.

fields.name: encoding
fields.description: Data encoding format used for the Solana transaction payload. base58 | base64

fields.name: skipPreflight
fields.description: When true, bypasses Solana's preflight transaction validation for faster submission.

fields.name: preflightCommitment
fields.description: Solana network commitment level for transaction validation checks. confirmed | finalized | processed

fields.name: maxRetries
fields.description: Maximum number of automatic retry attempts for failed Solana transaction submissions.

fields.name: minContextSlot
fields.description: Minimum Solana blockchain slot required for transaction processing.

errors.description: Bad Request - Invalid request parameters or malformed request.
Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key.
Too Many Requests - Rate limit exceeded.
Internal Server Error - An error occurred on the server.
Service Unavailable - The service is temporarily unavailable.
Gateway Timeout - The request timed out.

fields.name: transaction
fields.description: The signed transaction, as an encoded string (base58 or base64).

fields.name: encoding
fields.description: Encoding used for the transaction data. base58 | base64

fields.name: skipPreflight
fields.description: Skip the preflight transaction checks.

fields.name: preflightCommitment
fields.description: Commitment level to use for preflight. confirmed | finalized | processed

fields.name: sigVerify
fields.description: If true, verify the transaction signatures.

fields.name: replaceRecentBlockhash
fields.description: If true, replace the transaction recent blockhash with the most recent one.

fields.name: minContextSlot
fields.description: Minimum slot at which to perform preflight transaction checks.

fields.name: innerInstructions
fields.description: If true, include inner instructions in the response.

fields.name: accounts
fields.description: Configuration for returning account data.

fields.name: accounts.addresses
fields.description: Array of accounts to return, as base-58 encoded strings.

fields.name: accounts.encoding
fields.description: Encoding format for returned account data. base64 | base58 | base64+zstd | jsonParsed

errors.description: Bad Request - Invalid request parameters or malformed request.
Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key.
Too Many Requests - Rate limit exceeded.
Internal Server Error - An error occurred on the server.
Service Unavailable - The service is temporarily unavailable.
Gateway Timeout - The request timed out.
